name: Master of Weaponry
description: Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type.

descriptionreplaced: Shift 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type.
storytext: "Watch and learn, comrade! A real warrior isn't picky about their weapons!"
